name: Webnative

unions.name: RedirectTo
unions.comment: Where the authorisation lobby should redirect to after authorisation.

aliases.name: FileSystemPermissions
aliases.type: { privatePaths : List.List String.String, publicPaths : List.List String.String }

aliases.name: Permissions
aliases.type: { app : Maybe.Maybe Webnative.AppPermissions, fs : Maybe.Maybe Webnative.FileSystemPermissions }

aliases.name: Request
aliases.type: { tag : String.String, method : String.String, arguments : List.List Json.Encode.Value }

aliases.name: Response
aliases.type: { tag : String.String, method : String.String, data : Json.Encode.Value }

name: Wnfs

unions.name: Artifact
unions.comment: Artifact we receive in the response.

aliases.name: Entry
aliases.type: { cid : String.String, name : String.String, kind : Wnfs.Kind, size : Basics.Int }

values.name: decodeResponse
values.comment:
Function to be used to decode the response from webnative we got through our port.

    GotWnfsResponse response ->
        case Wnfs.decodeResponse tagFromString response of
            Ok ( ReadHelloTxt, Wnfs.Utf8Content helloContents ) ->
                -- Do something with content from hello.txt

            Ok ( Mutation, _ ) ->
                ( model
                , Ports.wnfsRequest Wnfs.publish
                )

            Err errString ->
                -- Decoding, or tag parse, error.

See the [README](../) for the full example.
values.type: (String.String -> Result.Result String.String tag) -> Webnative.Response -> Result.Result String.String ( tag, Wnfs.Artifact )

values.name: exists
values.comment: Check if something exists in the filesystem.

values.name: mv
values.type: Wnfs.Base -> { from : List.List String.String, to : List.List String.String, tag : String.String } -> Webnative.Request

values.name: publish
values.comment:
Publish your changes to your filesystem.
**ðŸ“¢ You should run this after doing mutations.**
See [README](../) examples for more info.

values.name: read
values.comment: Read something from the filesystem in the form of `Bytes`.

values.name: readUtf8
values.comment: Read something from the filesystem in the form of a `String`.

values.name: writeUtf8
values.comment: Write to the filesystem using a `String`.
